verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to thee that destroyest <S%H7703><s%>, and thou wast not destroyed <S%H7703><s%>; and dealest treacherously <S%H898><s%>, and they dealt not treacherously <S%H898><s%> with thee <S%H8552><s%>! When thou hast ceased to destroy <S%H7703><s%>, thou shalt be destroyed <S%H7703><s%>; and when thou hast made an end <S%H5239><s%> of dealing treacherously <S%H898><s%>, they shall deal treacherously with thee <S%H898><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, be gracious <S%H2603><s%> unto us <S%H6960><s%>; we have waited for thee <S%H2220><s%>: be thou our arm every morning <S%H1242><s%>, our salvation <S%H3444><s%> also in the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

At the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the tumult <S%H1995><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are fled <S%H5074><s%>; at the lifting up <S%H7427><s%> of thyself the nations <S%H1471><s%> are scattered <S%H5310><s%>.
And your spoil <S%H7998><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> as the caterpillar <S%H2625><s%> gathereth <S%H625><s%>: as locusts <S%H1357><s%> leap <S%H4944><s%> shall men leap upon it <S%H8264><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is exalted <S%H7682><s%>; for he dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>: he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> with justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

And there shall be stability <S%H530><s%> in thy times <S%H6256><s%>, abundance <S%H2633><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>, wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is thy treasure <S%H214><s%>.
Behold <S%H691><s%>, their valiant ones cry <S%H6817><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>; the ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> weep <S%H1058><s%> bitterly <S%H4751><s%>.

The highways <S%H4546><s%> lie waste <S%H8074><s%>, the wayfaring man <S%H5674><s%> ceaseth <S%H7673><s%>: the enemy hath broken <S%H6565><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, he hath despised <S%H3988><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%>, he regardeth <S%H2803><s%> not man <S%H582><s%>.

The land <S%H776><s%> mourneth <S%H56><s%> and languisheth <S%H535><s%>; Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> is confounded <S%H2659><s%> and withereth away <S%H7060><s%>; Sharon <S%H8289><s%> is like a desert <S%H6160><s%>; and Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and Carmel <S%H3760><s%> shake off their leaves <S%H5287><s%>.
Now will I arise <S%H6965><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; now will I lift up <S%H5375><s%> myself <S%H7426><s%>; now will I be exalted.
Ye shall conceive <S%H2029><s%> chaff <S%H2842><s%>, ye shall bring forth <S%H3205><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%>: your breath <S%H7307><s%> is a fire <S%H784><s%> that shall devour you <S%H398><s%>.
And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall be as the burnings <S%H4955><s%> of lime <S%H7875><s%>, as thorns <S%H6975><s%> cut down <S%H3683><s%>, that are burned <S%H3341><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye that are far off <S%H7350><s%>, what I have done <S%H6213><s%>; and <S%H7138><s%>, ye that are near, acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> my might <S%H1369><s%>.

The sinners <S%H2400><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> are afraid <S%H6342><s%>; trembling <S%H6342><s%> hath seized <S%H270><s%> the godless <S%H2611><s%> ones <S%H1481><s%>: Who among us can dwell with the devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>? who among us can dwell <S%H1481><s%> with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> burnings <S%H4168><s%>?

He that walketh <S%H1980><s%> righteously <S%H6666><s%>, and speaketh <S%H1696><s%> uprightly <S%H4339><s%>; he that despiseth <S%H3988><s%> the gain <S%H1215><s%> of oppressions <S%H4642><s%>, that shaketh <S%H5287><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> from taking <S%H8551><s%> a bribe <S%H7810><s%>, that stoppeth <S%H331><s%> his ears <S%H241><s%> from hearing <S%H8085><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and shutteth <S%H6105><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> from looking <S%H7200><s%> upon evil <S%H7451><s%>:

He shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>; his place of defence <S%H4869><s%> shall be the munitions <S%H4679><s%> of rocks <S%H5553><s%>; his bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> him <S%H4325><s%>; his waters shall be sure <S%H539><s%>.
Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H2372><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in his beauty <S%H3308><s%>: they shall behold <S%H7200><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that reacheth afar <S%H4801><s%>.

Thy heart <S%H3820><s%> shall muse <S%H1897><s%> on the terror <S%H367><s%>: Where is he that counted <S%H5608><s%>, where is he that weighed <S%H8254><s%> the tribute <S%H5608><s%>? where is he that counted the towers <S%H4026><s%>?

Thou shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> the fierce <S%H3267><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> of a deep <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> that thou canst not comprehend <S%H8085><s%>, of a strange <S%H3932><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> that thou canst not understand <S%H998><s%>.

Look <S%H2372><s%> upon Zion <S%H6726><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> of our solemnities <S%H4150><s%>: thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a quiet <S%H7600><s%> habitation <S%H5116><s%>, a tent <S%H168><s%> that shall not be removed <S%H6813><s%>, the stakes <S%H3489><s%> whereof shall never <S%H5331><s%> be plucked <S%H5265><s%> up <S%H2256><s%>, neither shall any of the cords thereof be broken <S%H5423><s%>.

But there Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will be with us in majesty <S%H117><s%>, a place <S%H4725><s%> of broad <S%H7342><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> and streams <S%H2975><s%>, wherein shall go <S%H3212><s%> no <S%H1077><s%> galley <S%H590><s%> with oars <S%H7885><s%>, neither shall gallant <S%H117><s%> ship <S%H6716><s%> pass thereby <S%H5674><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is our judge <S%H8199><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is our lawgiver <S%H2710><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is our king <S%H4428><s%>; he will save us <S%H3467><s%>.

Thy tacklings <S%H2256><s%> are loosed <S%H5203><s%>; they could not strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the foot <S%H3653><s%> of their mast <S%H8650><s%>, they could not spread <S%H6566><s%> the sail <S%H5251><s%>: then was the prey <S%H5706><s%> of a great <S%H4766><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%>; the lame <S%H6455><s%> took <S%H962><s%> the prey <S%H957><s%>.

And the inhabitant <S%H7934><s%> shall not say <S%H559><s%>, I am sick <S%H2470><s%>: the people <S%H5971><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein shall be forgiven <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
